title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details. The duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB: The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table lacks a label so it can contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection should be allowed as the move up/down operation can be applied to more than one item. The signature preview is not properly wrapping. The signature preview should have its background color set to the same color as the hover.
EB: The marking between the button and list should be adjusted to a proper size. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog. The table should have a label so that it can contain a mnemonic. The user should be able to make multiple selections, as the move up/down operation can be applied to more than one item. The signature preview should properly wrap its text. The background color of the signature preview should match the hover color.
SR: To reproduce the issue, try changing a parameter name to something very long and observe that the preview is cut off.
